attributes.action: ALL politicians to show respect to SOLDIERS killed for this nation over Ramadan.
attributes.additional_details:
D-DAY 6th June 1944. When the beaches washed with so much blood whilst our military elders were saving 80% of the EU nations who actually colluded and helped the Nazis.
Ramadan, I have no clue and don't care, goats involved maybe? Disgrace is what it is
attributes.background: I find it absolutely disgusting along with the majority of the British population that Mr Camoron can make a dedicated video wishing Muslims a Happy Ramadan 2016 but I fail to find any reference to the fact today is the 6th June (D-Day) when this nation and our non EU allies saved Europes behind...

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be asking individual politicians, rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole, to take action.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to organise a specific event to commemorate D-Day.
